Desc.entry: Part of Activity Sheffield, available to support community groups and organisations in devising street sports activity programmes tailored to their target audiences. Can assist with: identifying suitable venues; support with searching for funding; devising long-term street sport activity programmes; organising street sport fundays and competitions; publicising street sport events.

Pubs.entry: Street Sports brochure; Go For It magazine

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-5pm (office times); activities at various venues and times, please contact for details
